results.title: Mozzie
results.creator_credit: Dylan Yeo, Jane Keneally and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Spectacular animation about fluorocarbons, global warming and radical brain surgery. An evil entrepreneur discovers the real price of his actions. Combined live action and computer animation. Written, directed and animated by Dylan Yeo. Original format 35mm/colour.

results.title: Midas
results.creator_credit: Niki Bern, Isabel Perez and AFTRS
results.brief_description: ‘Midas’ is a retelling of the story of King Midas and the Golden Touch. It is told from the perspective of the narrator who read the tale over and over again as a child. The film begins brightly but becomes darker as some of the narration’s unspoken implications are revealed. Narrated by Zoe Carides.

results.title: Little echo lost
results.creator_credit: Armagan Ballantyne, Jane Keneally and AFTRS
results.brief_description: The EchoMan has never questioned his existence till now. One day he witnesses an event that brings into question everything he stands for and believes in. Stars Hugo Weaving as the EchoMan and Alana de Roma as the young girl. Original format 35mm.

results.title: Milk
results.creator_credit: Mairi Cameron, Jane Keneally, AFTRS and Anthony Johnsen
results.brief_description: The Old Man lives on his own, and has done so for as long as he can remember. He doesn’t go out except to buy milk. The Downstairs Woman lives directly below. Every evening she comes home from work, walks upstairs and borrows a jug of milk.

results.title: Great falls
results.creator_credit: Yves Stening, Libby Porter and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Jackie and his father return from a duck shooting trip to find his mother preparing to leave home with a young Air Force officer. She tells Jackie that she wants “a less domestic life”. Jackie doesn’t really understand what has happened but he knows that these things do happen and that life goes on somehow. “… I thought to myself that my life had turned … it was something that happened
to you - I knew that - and it happened to me in this way now.” Based on the short story by Richard Ford.
results.description:
Jackie and his father return from a duck shooting trip to find his mother preparing to leave home with a young Air Force officer. She tells Jackie that she wants “a less domestic life”. Jackie doesn’t really understand what has happened but he knows that these things do happen and that life goes on somehow. “… I thought to myself that my life had turned … it was something that happened
to you - I knew that - and it happened to me in this way now.” Based on the short story by Richard Ford.
description_for_label:
Jackie and his father return from a duck shooting trip to find his mother preparing to leave home with a young Air Force officer. She tells Jackie that she wants “a less domestic life”. Jackie doesn’t really understand what has happened but he knows that these things do happen and that life goes on somehow. “… I thought to myself that my life had turned … it was something that happened
to you - I knew that - and it happened to me in this way now.” Based on the short story by Richard Ford.

results.title: Zipper: great moments in art and fashion
results.material_description: Single channel moving image, colour and audio
results.brief_description: Live action, choreography, animation and painting combine in a breathless trip through 20th century images in art and fashion - as you may not have seen them before. Voiceover presented by Arthur Dignam.

results.title: Guru
results.creator_credit: Safina Uberoi, Pascal Guilloux and AFTRS
results.brief_description: In the West, people fall in love and then get married. In India, people get married and then fall in love. But this is not India - this is Parramatta, in Sydney, Australia…A film celebrating cultural clashes amidst a wild and wonderful festival of colour. Original format 16 mm.

results.title: The Drip
results.brief_description: No matter what the doting Helmut does, his wife Gertrude is never satisfied. But things are about to change. When an ever-increasing drip starts falling from the sky onto Gertrude’s head, it’s Helmut to the rescue!

results.title: Odd jobs
results.creator_credit: Daniel Nettheim, Jonathon Green, AFTRS and Andrew Ryan
results.brief_description: Two Boy Scouts, intent on earning money by doing odd jobs, stumble upon a spooky old house and its macabre owner. He looks forward to scaring them with his “house of horrors” - but young boys today aren’t so easily frightened.
